item.title: Check if String Is Number in JAVA
item.description:
1. Introduction

In the real world, we can identify the difference between String and Number in a simple way as below mention.

1  113 is Number
2  29.9 is Number
3  9.9d is Number
4  xyz is Not a Number
5  -369 is Number

In the above example, you see that "XYZ" is String as we clearly identify manually But it is difficult to identify using some code.

2. Question to be asked

There is more than one way anyone can ask this question as below:

Check if the string is int

In JAVA check if the string is a number

Check if the string is number java

In JAVA check if the string is numeric

How can identify input is a string or integer in java

2. Practical Code

There is mainly two way we can give above all answer.

2.1.1 Logical Code Using JAVA:

 1public class NumberCheck {
 2
 3	public static void main(String[] args) {
 4
 5		System.out.println("113 is numeric : " + isNumericCheck("113"));
 6		System.out.println("29.9 is numeric : " + isNumericCheck("29.9"));
 7		System.out.println("9.9d is numeric : " + isNumericCheck("9.9d"));
 8		System.out.println("xyz is numeric : " + isNumericCheck("xyz"));
 9		System.out.println("-369 is numeric : " + isNumericCheck("-369"));
10
11	}
12
13	public static boolean isNumericCheck(String str) {
14
15		if (str == null || str.length() == 0) {
16			return false;
17		}
18
19		try {
20			Double.parseDouble(str);
21			return true;
22
23		} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
24			return false;
25		}
26
27	}
28}
29
30

Output

1  113 is numeric : true
2  29.9 is numeric : true
3  9.9d is numeric : true
4  xyz is numeric : false
5  -369 is numeric : true

2.1.2 Using Depedency or Library in JAVA project.

You need to add below depedency in your project.

1   <dependency>
2    <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
3    <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
4    <version>3.11</version>
5  </dependency>

 1  import org.apache.commons.lang3.math.NumberUtils;
 2  public class NumberCheck {
 3
 4    public static void main(String[] args) {
 5      
 6      
 7      
 8              System.out.println("113 is numeric : "+NumberUtils.isCreatable("113"));
 9              System.out.println("29.9 is numeric : "+NumberUtils.isCreatable("29.9"));
10              System.out.println("9.9d is numeric : "+NumberUtils.isCreatable("9.9d"));
11              System.out.println("xyz is numeric : "+NumberUtils.isCreatable("xyz"));
12              System.out.println("-369 is numeric : "+NumberUtils.isCreatable("-369"));
13
14    }
15
16  }

Output

1  113 is numeric : true
2  29.9 is numeric : true
3  9.9d is numeric : true
4  xyz is numeric : false
5  -369 is numeric : true
6

3. Conclusion

To put it in nutshell in this article we got brief knowledge about identifying a String is a numeric or not in java. We identify both ways via external library and codebase.

item.title: 5 Tips for How to Crack Ielts in 10 Days
item.description:
Everyone has a Dream about a study or settle in abroad. First of all, you need to learn that particular language of that country and clear exam then after you can go there. Mainly IELTS(Internation English Language Testing System) exam is best for settle or study in a foreign country. Two bodies conduct IELT exam

  1. British Academy
  2. IDP Academy

you can select any.

IELTS contains 4 modules as an examination

  1. Listening
  2. Reading
  3. Writing
  4. Speaking

The first 3 modules of the exam conduct on the same day and the Speaking Exam conduct on other days.

Let me brief you on how you can crack IELTS in a 10 day

  1. You need to be strong in "English Grammar" For this there are several books and youtube videos available so you can study that. You must be spent 1:30 hour daily on Grammar for up to 10 days.
  2. Watch Online WebSeries in English and listen to English songs with lyrics so you got an idea about pronunciation as well as sentence structure. You must be spent at least 2 hours on an English web series or movie and 1 hour on English songs for up to 10 days.
  3. You must have read at least 2 hours a day. Either English newspaper or reading a book.
  4. Speaking is tough and you need to be required so much practice so keep pratice with friends and family members or practice in front of a mirror. Recording that pratice section and listen carefully and identify your mistake and correct it. You need to practice at least 2 hours a day for speaking.
  5. You need to complete all Cambridge tests in 10 days and all test scores must be 8 bands so, you can get 8 bands in the actual exam.

Last but not least, you need to practice as one of the best quotes I read "Practise makes a man perfect".

item.title: The 5 Best Things About How to Boost Immune System Naturally
item.description:
Due to Covid-19 or Coronavirus was declared as a pandemic by the WHO. There are numerous people unable to fight this virus due to a lack of immunity system but today I am going to discuss some interesting things that added value to your life in this pandemic situation that cause anyone can fight against this virus.

The WHO already declared two ways to fight against this Covid-19 situation.

  1. Social distance and Wear a mask.
  2. frequently washing hands.

Of course, several countries found vaccines but we also need to take care individually of our immune system. now our question is How Can We improve our immune system?

Here's the top 5 way to boost your immune system.

1. Quality Sleep :

Immunity and sleep are closely bindings with each other. If any person is not able to get quality sleep so that links to sickness and problems. As per the doctor's suggestion any human being required a minimum 8-hour sleep. "Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise" so that slogan was given by our accident and it truly defines our lifestyle. if you are not able to sleep at a time so you need to follow the below ideas.

  • It is advisable to read a book before sleep so, that helps to reduce your stress and sleep deeply.
  • Listen to good music before sleep.
  • Chanting with meditation so that helps you for better sleep.

Make sure every day you are going to sleep at the same time.

2. Maintain Weight :

In the current pandemic situation, we need to take care of our body weight because it causes other issues for our body if we are overweighted. Reduce stress levels and get enough up sleep as well as exercise and meditation will help reduce weight. if you want to know about how to reduce weight so, please read Best 2 Way to Loss Your Weight Tips.

3. Balance Diet / Drink Water frequantly :

Diet is a serious factor for our body and immunity. There are several ways to increase our immune system with a healthy diet. we can eat proper food that contains vitamins and properties so, it helps to improve our immune system and time is also a key factor that we can eat food at a particular time. Like before 12 pm in the morning and before 8 pm. The human body required a minimum of 3 Liters of water. Our water consumption level also equal to or more so, which can be helpful for our body to maintain weight. Only drink lukewarm water and avoid cold water.

4. Excercise / Meditation / Yoga :

A lot of things depend on our daily schedule and exercise, meditation and yoga is the best part to do by a human for maintaining the body as well as improve our body system. As per professionals, we required a minimum of 30 minutes of exercise daily or meditation, yoga. best time for excercise, meditation and yoga is in the morning and evening. If want to know more about yoga so visit Why you need to do yoga daily?

5. Use Supplements for immunity boost :

We can use numerous supplements to immune our system that helps to fight against in COIVD-19 situation. We can use supplements as vitamins that contain in either liquid or powder form. There are below supplements we can use.

* Vitamin C: It may help to reduce infection level.
* Vitamin D: It helps to reduce the risk of cold and improve the immunity system.
* Garlic: It helps to reduce viral infection and care for a common cold.
* Zinc: It also helps to reduce the common cold when it took within 24 hours of onset.
* Honey: It helps to fight against cough.
* Lemon: Intake of lemon increases the digestive system and reduces the level of viral infection.

Conclusion:

  • Minimum 8-hour quality sleep required.
  • Eat healthy food on time that contains many minerals and vitamins.
  • Avoid so much sugar, Instead of that use jaggery.
  • Drink lukewarm water.
  • Every day do Mediation, Yoga, and Exercise.
  • Increase intake of Tumeric, Garlic, Coriander, and Mint Leaves.
  • Use supplements for vitamins.
  • Use Lemon with lukewarm water everyday in the morning.
As we are fighting against the Covid-19 or Coronavirus pandemic situation so, we must follow the above steps to cover and protect ourselves.

Stay Healthy and Stay Fit.

item.title: How to Why You Need to Do Yoga Daily ?
item.description:
YOGA came from the Sanskrit word "YUG" which means "UNION".

There are countless advantages of doing yoga every day. Today I am discussing when, why, how you should do yoga.

In today's era, no one has abundant time to maintain health due to hectic work schedules and family responsibilities. There are several ways to take your body, mind, and soul to make it healthy but one of the best ways is YOGA.

1. What is yoga?

There has no perfect definition of yoga. some people point it to be Science or Meditation.

In today's digital era people are mostly not have time to do exercise but yoga helps to reduce the stress of work and maintain balance peace of mind. A number of research proven that by doing yoga you can solve the 'N' number of diseases. Even you can be fit and look young and energetic.

2. How we can do yoga?

There are various methods of 'YOGA' that you need to perform without disturbance. There are a few methods as I illustrated via picture.

3. When you need to do yoga?

Everyone is confused when we need to do yoga? what is the best time to do yoga? As such, there has no fixed time to do yoga but there are numerous research proven that if someone does yoga in the morning so, it is beneficial for health, body, mind, and soul. Because in the morning person have plenty of energy that's why it is fruitful to do yoga in the morning.

4. Advantages of yoga?

There are countless benefits of doing yoga on a daily but I mention a few of them below.

  • Improve heart health.

    If someone doing yoga daily basis so it increases blood circulation and it can help lower blood, cholesterol, blood glucose level and maintain heart rate.

  • Relief back pain.

    There are several poses in yoga that relieve you from back pain and give you the energy to maintain your daily activity fastly.

  • Provide you more energy and a healthy heart.

    It provides you with more energy to achieve your daily goals as well as keep you mentally and physically active.

  • Quality sleep.

    Doing yoga every day provides you to maintain a schedule and a relaxed mind that can help you for quality sleep.

  • Protects your spine.

    There are different types of poses in yoga so, while performing that your body will be in good shape and make your bone stronger and protect your spine.

  • Improve focus power.

    Yoga has several poses that help with meditation. With the help of that meditation focus and decision power increase so, with less time achieve more things.

Note:

If you are doing yoga the first time so, you need a trainer to understand how can perform yoga otherwise it's an effective wrong way.

Conclusion:

  • Yoga has no specific definition.
  • There are several poses that you can do yoga.
  • Yoga has numerous benefits.
  • You can do yoga either morning or evening but as per professional teacher morning yoga is more effective.

item.title: Describe Yourself in a Few Lines - Ielts Speaking Topic
item.description:
I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. In my last job, this passion led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that helped me to do better work. For example, I taught myself how to use react to integrate REST API. So I became a part of front-end developer as well.

I am ambitious and driven. I thrive on challenges and constantly set goals for myself, so I have something to strive towards. Iâ€™m not comfortable with settling, and Iâ€™m always looking for an opportunity to do better and achieve greatness.

I am highly organized. I always take notes, and I use a series of tools to help myself stay on top of deadlines. I like to keep a clean workspace and create a logical filing method to always find what I need. I find this increases efficiency and also helps the rest of the team stay on track.

I have a leader quality. I find co-workers usually come to me with questions or concerns even when Iâ€™m not in a leadership role because if I donâ€™t know the answer, Iâ€™ll at least point them in the right direction

Iâ€™m a people person. I love meeting new people and learning about their lives and their backgrounds. I can almost always find common ground with strangers, and I like making people feel comfortable in my presence. I find this skill is especially helpful when kicking off projects with new clients.

I am results-oriented, constantly checking in to determine how close or how far away we are and what it will take to make it happen. I find this pressure inspiring and a great motivator for the rest of the team.

I am an excellent communicator. I pride myself on making sure people have the right information because it drives better results. Most business issues stem from poor communication, so I feel a responsibility to keep everyone on the same page.

item.title: What is String in Java
item.description:
String In Java

In lemon language, we can identify String as a Collection Of Characters. But in java String identify as an object. We can declare String as an array In java as well as simple way as we write a String, But both the way String object collect that value as same.

Those two methods are below to declare a String.

1. Declare String using array:

1    char c [] = {'d','a','r','s','h'}
2    String s = new String(c);

2. Declare as String Object.

1   String d = "darsh";

Note: The above two methods work similarly.

String Methods In Java

The string has numerous method which we can use for simplifying logic. few of the method names and descriptions we can understand via the below matrix.

Method Name Description Return Value
isEmpty() verify for emptry string boolean
length() return length of string int
toLowerCase() return string in lowercase String
toUpperCase() return string in uppercase String
charAt(int index) return char value of praticular index char

How many ways we can create a String object?

There is two way we can create an object of String as below :

1. Using String literal

2. Using new keyword

1. Using String literal

The string has double quotes that identify as literal.

1   String d = "darsh khatri";

Whenever you create a String object using String literal, so it will be found in JVM String pool. If the value of String already exists and it returns a reference of that String pool instance. Suppose if there has not a similar value of String in the String pool then, it will create a new object in JVM.

Illustration:
1   String d = "Peter Parker";
2   String k = "Peter Parker";
3

We have two objects as per the above pis of code. the first String value of the handler is 'd' and the second is 'k' . Both contain the same value and only one instance is created in JVM String pool, and the other carriers as a reference of the first one.

2. Create String using new keyword

1   String s = new String("Darsh");

In the above case, JVM creates a new object of String in heap memory, and the String literal Darsh will be in the String pool. The variable 's' is a handle or reference variable of that object.

String Example in Java

 1    public class Employee{
 2        public static void main(String args[]){
 3            String e1 = "Peter Parker";
 4            char c [] = {'j','o','h','n'};
 5            String e2 = new String(c);
 6            String e3 = new String("kate");
 7            System.out.println(e1);  
 8            System.out.println(e2);  
 9            System.out.println(e3);
10        }   
11    }

Output is :

1   Peter Parker
2   john
3   kate

Conclusion Points:

  • Collection of characters called String.
  • String is Object.
  • We can create String two-way. 1) String literal and 2) Using new keyword.
  • If Literal String have a similar value so, a new reference is not created in JVM string pool. It uses the reference of duplicate value.
  • String has various methods so, we can use that for different types of operation.

item.title: Best 2 Way to Loss Your Weight Tips
item.description:
There is numerous way to loss bodyweight but out of all of those, I will let you know about the most effective 2 methods of losing weight.

Weight is the most important factor for our body as well as our health, mind. we can face lots of issues due to overweight, but here I suggest you to some healthy tips to reduce your weight and maintain your balance.

1. Eath Healthy Food

Healthy food is an extremely key point in our body and one of the very known quotes that I remember at this point is "You Are What You Eat". We need to eat healthy food like vegetables, fruits as well as dried fruits such as almond, walnut, apricot, raisins, walnuts, etc.

Apart from the above, we can consume seeds like Chia seeds. We can inject that in several ways like: prepare ice cream or milk using seeds.

How can we forget "Fruits" while we are discussing weight loss and maintain the body?

Fruits are a natural source of gaining vitamins and nutrition for our body, so we can get plenty of energy to achieve our daily goals. We must eat fruits that contain ample water like watermelon, strawberries, peaches, orange, etc.

Consumption of fruits is also effective for our skin plus the intestine and it also helps for increasing immunity.

Remember that we need to eat so many colors at the time of lunch and breakfast, hence we can feel energetic in our fields.

2. Natural Exercise(WorkOut)

2.1 Walking

There is numerous exercise which you can do for reduce weight and belly fat. The primary exercise is "Walk". Every human needs to walk at least 30min per day, which helps to reduce weight and maintain the body, increased cardiovascular, decreased risk of heart stroke, or heart-related disease. "Walking" helps to make a born stronger and burn calories. Apart from that below is more advantages of "30 minutes Walking" every day.

Advantage of 30 minutes Walk.

  • Increase immunity
  • Improve mental health
  • Creative Thinking
  • It can help to control or lower blood sugar

2.2 Yoga

Indian assistant foremost root for "exercise" is "Yoga" and now a day it is most popular to maintain a body and reduce weight. There are varipus pose in yoga that helps to reduce weight like : "Bhujangasana, Kumbhakasana, Naukasana, Ustrasana, Dhanurasana".

Bhujangasana (Cobra pose)

Kumbhakasana(The plank)

Naukasana(Boat pose)

Ustrasana(Camel Pose)

Dhanurasana(Bow pose)

"Surya Namaskar" is also best for maintaining the body, energy as well as fat loss. It's a good cardio exercise and Its stances help in extending your stomach muscles making you shed pounds around the midsection so, approximately 10 minutes of "Surya Namaskar" burning "139 calories". It is also helpful to bring down blood sugar levels.

Prefer timing for "Surya Namaskar" is either in early(sunrise time) morning or late evening(sunset)

You can follow the below way to do "Surya Namaskar".

To put it in nutshell, the above two methods assist you to help improve your immune system if you follow them in daily routine life also it helps to reduce weight.

Stay Healthy and Stay Fit.
